response.overview: An unemployed, about to be evicted woman decides to sacrifice the town mayor/her landlord to the old gods at the solar eclipse and consume his riches. Cate Turner is a famished rural witch. Her resources have withered and decayed while her next door neighbor, landlord, and small town mayor John Windsor lives high on the hog. He butchered the company where most of the town worked, and he's ready to purge Cate and her cat. The total solar eclipse will cast a shadow over the country, so Cate decides to cast an ancient Mesopotamian spell to extract the riches from her landlord and consume them herself. A short dark drama, cannibalism horror film.
response.title: Eat the Rich
